name: Surviving The Night
description:
Surviving the Night is a zombie survival game that closely clones a 24 hour Hack-a-thon winning game we previously made. Survive the Night  is currently in beta and only the arcade version is available at the moment. 

Arcade Mode - Collect weapons and try to kill as many zombies as you can before you are killed yourself.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Change Weapons:  2  for Flame Thrower, 3  For Shot Gun and 4 For Zombie Cure

Use Item or Weapon: Q, except for torches press 1 to activate a torch if you have one.

Planned Features

Building: Players will be able to build shelters/forts to protect them from the  mobs.  Mobs will be able to tear down these structures if they are not properly protected.

Players will be able to build traps and weapons to defend their structures.

Crafting: Currently the only way for players to get items is from mob drops.  Players will be able to collect items and use them to craft other items.
